content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "birch_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 26, "index": 11}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 51, "index": 12}, {"type": "bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 8, "index": 14}, {"type": "crimson_stairs", "quantity": 39, "index": 18}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 24, "index": 21}, {"type": "potato", "quantity": 50, "index": 24}, {"type": "chainmail_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "tnt", "quantity": 64, "index": 28}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 60, "index": 30}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "salmon_spawn_egg", "quantity": 36, "index": 32}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "green_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 2, "index": 43}, {"type": "acacia_sign", "quantity": 13, "index": 44}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 5, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a jungle boat, I need to first craft jungle planks. Jungle planks can be crafted from either jungle log, jungle wood, stripped jungle log or stripped jungle wood. Since I have a stripped jungle wood in slot 43, I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: The jungle planks have been crafted. Since they are not needed anymore, I will move them out of the crafting grid into an empty slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 4

Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1
